import { React, useState, useEffect } from 'react' import './style/message.css' import useAxios from '../utils/useAxios' import jwtDecode from 'jwt-decode' import moment from 'moment' import axios from 'axios' import { useParams, link } from 'react-router-dom/' function MessageDetail() { const baseURL = 'http://127.0.0.1:8000/' // detail page const [message, setMesssage] = useState([]) const id = useParams() const token = localStorage.getItem('authTokens'); const tokenObject = JSON.parse(token); const user_id = jwtDecode(tokenObject.access).user_id useEffect(() => { try { axios.get(baseURL + 'get-messages/' + user_id + '/' + id.id + '/').then((res) => { setMesssage(res.data) }) } catch (error) { console.log(error) } }) return (

Messages

{messages.map((message) =>
{moment.utc(message.created_at).local().startOf('seconds').fromNow().toString()}
{message.sender_first_name}
{message.message}
)}
Sharon Lessman
